verification_docs.checklist_description: To ensure the quality and safety of our platform, we require all teachers to verify their identity and credentials. Please review our regulatory requirements. Once all the documents are in place, our team will review them to ensure that your profile is fully verified. You can upload various documents here to prove your identity and qualifications as a teacher on our platform. Required documents are necessary for full platform access, while optional documents can enhance your profile. Please ensure all documents are clear, valid, and show the requested information. Illegible or incomplete documents will be rejected and may delay your verification process. For any questions, refer to the help section on the right.
verification_docs.required_docs_subtitle: These documents are mandatory for full platform access.
verification_docs.ordination_description: Proof of your ordination or service authorization.
verification_docs.proof_of_address_description: A recent utility bill or bank statement (issued within the last 3 months).
verification_docs.optional_docs_subtitle: Enhance your profile and credibility with additional documents.
verification_docs.academic_transcript_description: Your academic record from a recognized institution.

teacher_dashboard.welcome_subtitle: Complete your setup to start teaching and earning.
teacher_dashboard.faq_a1: Verification typically takes 1-3 business days once all required documents are submitted.
teacher_dashboard.faq_a2: Payouts are processed monthly for the previous month's earnings, typically by the 15th.
teacher_dashboard.faq_q3: Can I update my documents later?
teacher_dashboard.faq_a3: Yes, you can upload new documents at any time from the Verification tab if your information changes.

payout_setup.subtitle: Configure how you want to receive your earnings.
payout_setup.bank_transfer_desc: Direct deposit to your bank account
payout_setup.mobile_money_desc: Transfer to mobile wallet (e.g. Telebirr, M-Pesa)
payout_setup.address_placeholder: Full street address, City, State, Zip
payout_setup.tax_agree_label: I certify that the information provided is correct and I agree to the Tax Terms.
payout_setup.transactional_terms_description: By confirming, you agree to our payout terms. Payments are processed weekly for balances over $50 equivalent. Standard processing times apply based on your bank or provider.
payout_setup.next_steps_description: We will verify your payout details. This usually takes 1-2 business days. In the meantime, please complete your identity verification to ensure uninterrupted payments.

teacher_security.title: Account Security
teacher_security.subtitle: Manage your password and account security settings
teacher_security.password_too_short: New password must be at least 8 characters
teacher_security.change_password_description: Regularly update your password to keep your account secure
teacher_security.password_length_hint: Must be at least 8 characters long
teacher_security.security_settings_description: Additional security options for your account

teacher_security.login_notifications_description: Get notified of new logins to your account
teacher_security.session_management_description: View and manage your active sessions
teacher_security.delete_account_desc: Permanently delete your account and all associated data. This action cannot be undone.
teacher_security.confirm_delete_desc: This will permanently delete your account, all your courses, lessons, and data. Type DELETE to confirm.
